thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Opera Lafayette - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very poor conditions
thread.title_full: Very poor conditions - Review of Mercure Paris Opera Lafayette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: franczakj
title: Very poor conditions
text: The place isn't value for money even for Paris standards. The bedding smelled of mould, the room was awfully small, noise in the bathroom woke us up- it sounded like a rat in the pipes. And the worse of all - we asked for an iron and we were told that theu do not have any anywhere in the hotel, which i find shocking!
